entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
